statements: SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, order_total, shipping_address FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT shipping_address, order_total FROM orders WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC, order_total ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_total FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 1001 ORDER BY order_total DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, shipping_address FROM orders WHERE shipping_address LIKE '%New York%' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, order_total FROM orders WHERE order_total > 1000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, order_total DESC;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, order_total, shipping_address FROM orders WHERE order_total BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders;
SELECT * FROM shipping_details;
SELECT shipping_address, shipping_date FROM shipping_details;
SELECT order_id, shipping_address, delivery_status FROM shipping_details;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, shipping_address FROM orders INNER JOIN shipping_details ON orders.order_id = shipping_details.order_id WHERE shipping_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY total_amount;
SELECT order_id, order_date, delivery_status FROM orders INNER JOIN shipping_details ON orders.order_id = shipping_details.order_id WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, customer_name FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50.00;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_date, shipping_address FROM shipments ORDER BY shipment_date;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount < 1000.00;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, quantity FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY shipment_date;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_name LIKE '%Doe%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity, price*quantity AS total_price FROM products WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount < 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM Orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY shipping_date ASC;

SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipping_date, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'Shipped';
SELECT record_id, timestamp, record_data->>'id' AS record_id FROM blockchain_records;
SELECT * FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT order_id, customer_name, order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;

SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 5000 AND total_amount < 10000;
SELECT shipment_id, shipping_date, delivery_status FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
